OOC: That's okay.

BIC:

Headstrong stood triumphantly over the two damaged robots. "Now *SNORT*
I just need to finish the job *SNORT*" he raised his sword, to dive it
deeply into First Aid, but a force from behind slammed into him, sending
him forward. Firedrill had gotten a second wind, and had attempted to
tackle Headstrong from behind. "You just Don't learn *SNORT* do you?"
Headstrong insulted, trying to swind his sword around so it would hit
Firedrill. Firedrill did his best to keep out of the way.
